title: Top Picks (Most Requested Statistics) : U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics
text:
An official website of the United States government Here is how you know The .gov means it's official. Federal government websites often end in .gov or .mil. Before sharing sensitive information,
			make sure you're on a federal government site. The site is secure. The https:// ensures that you are connecting to the official website and that any
			information you provide is encrypted and transmitted securely.
